info.name: Woven Cartoon Texture By RikR
info.description: Just an idea I had. Made by Rik Riesmeijer in 422 characters.

renderpass.code:
void mainImage(out vec4 c, vec2 v) {                        // Woven Cartoon Texture.
    v = v / 64.0 + vec2(iTime, 0);                          // Scale and center.
    float hdir = ceil(iTime * 0.3) + ceil(v.x) + ceil(v.y); // Get orientation.
    v = mix(v, v.yx, 2.0 * fract(0.5 * hdir));              // Symmetrize uvs.
    v = fract(v) * fract(-v) * 4.0 - 0.2;                   // Directional reflect.
    vec4 dark = vec4(0.800,0.000,0.000,1);                  // Between color.
    vec4 mid  = vec4(1.000,0.349,0.000,1);                  // Mid tone.
    vec4 main = vec4(1.000,0.867,0.000,1);                  // Highlight.
    vec2 b1 = vec2(0.10, 0.90 * v.y);                       // Mid balance.
    vec2 b2 = vec2(0.05, 0.95 * v.y);                       // Shadow balance.
    c = mix(mid, main, smoothstep(0.1, 0.9, dot(v, b1)));   // Mix mid and main.
    c = mix(dark, c, smoothstep(0.05, 0.2, dot(v, b2)));    // Mix shaded.
}                                                           // By Rik Riesmeijer.
                                                            // No rights reserved (CC0).
renderpass.name: Image
